item.title: Unix: how to check system configuration on solaris
item.description:
I had to compare machine hardware today, and found information on that here. **#prtdiag -v - **Gives hardware information about FSB, Sparc Model, CPU speed, RAM, Harddisks, USB drives (ie. PCI and networking slots) etc. Click on the image below, for a detailed overview of prtdiag’s output
#psrinfo -p - lists number of physical processors . #psrinfo -p -v - list number of virtual processors (cores) per physical processor.
